name: Snowfall (Curly Wynvan)
description:
My 2 Semester game for the HTK Academy

A short adventure game

You walk through the destroyed paradies of your homeland, to gather resources for your new homebase and the survivers of the great explosion of the v.3 droids 50 years ago.

You, as the Gatherer, look to find edible food and other possible resources to aid the survivors. And aid the other Droids in helping them with their tasks.

Controls:

-Keyboard-

WASD - Move around

Mouse - Look around

E - Use/Interact

ESC - Pause Menu

-Controller-

Left stick - Move around

Right stick - Look around

X/Square - Use/Interact

Start/Option Button - Pause Menu

If you use a Controller please note that the Hightlight for the buttons is not properly. But they work!
